definitions.explanation_en: A feminine given name of Greek origin, often considered a diminutive of Theresa or Teresa, and used as a standalone first name in English-speaking countries.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自希腊语的女性名字，常被视为 Theresa 或 Teresa 的昵称形式，但在英语国家中也作为独立的首名使用。
definitions.example_en: Tessa is a talented artist who exhibits her work in galleries across Europe.
definitions.example_cn: 特莎是一位才华横溢的艺术家，她的作品在欧洲各地的画廊展出。
